name: GACHIMUCHI REBIRTH
description: Lost memory "You got me mad now.", got into another world "That's not good, man.", doesn't understand what the fuck is going on "Like embarrassing me, huh?!", Doesn't remember his past. What could be better "Woo!"?!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound
